urls.description: Short of miles for your next award? You can buy the miles that you need to get closer to your next award. You can also gift or transfer miles to your friends and family.

urls.title: Extra baggage
urls.description: You aren' t registered yet? Join the program for free and start enjoying the benefits for flights made 90 days back. Excess and Special Baggage Purchase additional baggage at ethiopianairlines.com. You can also purchase it from Ethiopian ticketing offices, Ethiopian Global Contact Center, Ethiopian agents and Ethiopian Airport. If you have already booked a flight with Ethiopian, you can purchase your excess baggage using MANAGE BOOKING Ethiopian Airlines Baggage Policy for Excess baggage rate. Learn

data.text: @airgatetours Dear @airgatetours, Please be informed that we do not accept card payment for flights departing from Nigeria thus you would have to make the payment at a bank or at our local office. For information on the OK to board you would have to contact our team in your area.
